author: freeCodeCamp.org
description:
Discover how to master any language, including English, Spanish, Mandarin Chinese, and more, using cutting-edge AI tools like ChatGPT, DeepSeek, and Character AI. In this course, Boris, an experienced language teacher, will guide you through essential AI prompts, memory tricks like the 2-7-30 method, and practical techniques to improve speaking, grammar, and vocabulary. Whether you are preparing for the IELTS exam or just starting your language journey, this video is packed with tips to help you learn faster and smarter.

Course created by @AlterYourEnglish.

❤️ Support for this channel comes from our friends at Scrimba – the coding platform that's reinvented interactive learning: https://scrimba.com/freecodecamp

title: Learn ANY Language with AI (Learn English, Learn Spanish, Learn Mandarin Chinese, and more)
